00035 ScanBlock::ScanBlock() : m_flags(0), m_scanner_id(-1) {
00036   m_iter = m_vec.end();

00043 int ScanBlock::load(EventPtr &eventPtr) {
00044   uint8_t *msgPtr = eventPtr->message + 4;
00045   uint8_t *endPtr;
00046   size_t remaining = eventPtr->messageLen - 4;
00047   uint32_t len;
00048   ByteString key, value;
00049 
00050   m_event_ptr = eventPtr;
00051 
00052   m_vec.clear();
00053   m_iter = m_vec.end();
00054 
00055   if ((m_error = (int)Protocol::response_code(eventPtr)) != Error::OK)
00056     return m_error;
00057 
00058   if (!(Serialization::decode_short(&msgPtr, &remaining, &m_flags))) {
00059     m_error = Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00060     return m_error;
00061   }
00062 
00063   if (!(Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&m_scanner_id))) {
00064     m_error = Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00065     return m_error;
00066   }
00067 
00068   if (!(Serialization::decode_int(&msgPtr, &remaining, &len))) {
00069     m_error = Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED;
00070     return m_error;
00071   }
00072 
00073   endPtr = msgPtr + len;
00074 
00075   while (msgPtr < endPtr) {
00076     key.ptr = msgPtr;
00077     msgPtr += key.length();
00078     value.ptr = msgPtr;
00079     msgPtr += value.length();
00080     m_vec.push_back(std::make_pair(key, value));
00081   }
00082 
00083   m_iter = m_vec.begin();
00084 
00085   return m_error;
00086 }
00087

00089 bool ScanBlock::next(ByteString &key, ByteString &value) {
00090 
00091   assert(m_error == Error::OK);
00092 
00093   if (m_iter == m_vec.end())
00094     return false;
00095 
00096   key = (*m_iter).first;
00097   value = (*m_iter).second;
00098 
00099   m_iter++;
00100 
00101   return true;
00102 }
